EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo 5.6 Release - ServiceNow Integration, JVM, Improved UCS Performance & More
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://vmturbo.com/data-center-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5-6Webinar&utm_content=06102016]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We are just a few days away from the release of VMTurbo Operations Manager 5.6! On June 15th at 02:00 pm EST <[[http://vmturbo.com/data-center-control?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=5-6Webinar&utm_content=06072016]]> we will be hosting a webinar to discuss the new developments, which include:
- Private Cloud Control: Turn-key Integration with ServiceNow Real-time placement decisions for your ServiceNow environment and workload provisioning enable you to guarantee application performance and accelerate your private cloud initiatives.
- Java Virtual Machine Integration Extended control to any JVM format, including: Apache, Storm, Jetty and Tomcat.
- UCS Improved Performance Enhanced fabric market abstraction leads to improved system performance and reduced fabric utilization. Enabling enhanced management of your port throughput and blade usage.
- Deeper visibility into CloudStack Reach your desired system state faster, by managing your CloudStack environment with improved data consistency and compliance control.
- and more...
- The VMTurbo Team
